mapper.select: SELECT userId, nickName, gender, age, avatar, avatar_small, city, `type`, status, signature FROM `user` WHERE userId IN( SELECT friendId FROM user_friend WHERE userId = #{userId} );
SELECT userId, nickName, gender, age, avatar, avatar_small, city, `type`, status, signature, createDate, lastEditData, createUser, lastEditUser FROM `user` WHERE userId = #{userId}
SELECT userId, nickName, gender, age, avatar, avatar_small, city, `type`, status, signature FROM `user` WHERE userId LIKE CONCAT(#{userIdPrefix},'%') LIMIT 20;
mapper.update: UPDATE `user` SET signature = #{signature}, lastEditData = #{date}, lastEditUser = #{userId} WHERE userId = #{userId};
UPDATE `user` SET status = #{status}, lastEditData = #{date}, lastEditUser = #{userId} WHERE userId = #{userId};
UPDATE `user` SET avatar = #{avatar}, lastEditData = #{date}, lastEditUser = #{userId} WHERE userId = #{userId};
